node.text:
Some dinner dates are made more delightful when you have the sky and the sea for company! The Terrace at The Raviz Kovalam will be the best choice for you. Grab your chance for a tête-à-tête with some fine quality dining experience.

For bookings contact: +91 471 305 1234 | 1800 4252 2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com | reservations@theraviz.com
